entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView performs layout when it's been removed from the visibile window #17494
  • Use 'eg' to describe examples, not 'ex' #17492
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.4.8333] Crash using Pinvoke.SetParent to create Window as Child #17490
    .NET 8 GA
  • Obsolete AutomationProperties properties cause XamlC exception on NET 8 #17484
    .NET 8 GA
  • [MAUI] Ugly picture with MediaPicker.CapturePhotoAsync on macOS #17481
  • Can't select MAUI project on visual studio #17480
  • Navigation with arrow keys on Windows does not work between radio buttons #17479
  • [regression/8.0.0] Exception while using SetAppTheme extension #17478
  • [MAUI] [regression/8.0.0-rc.1] APP crashes when "minimized" at android #17477
  • DevTools not working #17476
  • [iOS] - Wrong Layouting in HorizontalStackLayout when WidthRequest in child element is not set #17475
  • MauiImage Resource doesnt override when there are files with same name #17474
  • [MAUI] D1 text fill editor page lacks an entire line of underlines. #17473
    .NET 8 GA
  • [MAUI] iOS simulator displays recipe title error in portrait screen #17471
    .NET 8 GA

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.0] MAUI custom control/mapper not working android #17483
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.5.8529] [MAUI] The 'New Recipe' page will crash in landscape mode on iOS simulator #17208
    .NET 8 GA
  • BlazorWebView scale is not right for displays with scales greater than 100% #17372
  • Border shadow leaks memory and eventually crashes the app (Android) #8563
    Backlog
  • Error MSB4018: The "AOTCompile" task failed unexpectedly #17340
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0] Exception after setting `BindingContext` #17427
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] [MAUI] The App crashes after pulling up and then pulling down the RefreshView C6 page #17391
    .NET 8 GA
  • net8 Maui iOS/Android Entry isn't cleared after set bound property value to null #17321

PullRequests

Created

  • Backport UI Test fixes from main #17496
  • Clean up iOS DragAndDropDelegate #17495
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/gestures
  • [net7.0] Null check everything in InvalidateMeasureIfContentSizeChanged #17493
  • [net7.0] Revert android net7.0 workload to 33.0.68 #17491
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [net7.0] Update all ASP.NET and MS.Extensions packages to latest stable #17487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1938.49 to 1.0.2045.28 #17486
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, backport/suggested, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Show the Raw HTML for Html Label in case of error #17470
    area/controls 🎮, Under Consideration

Merged

  • [net8.0] Merge main net8.0 #17489
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Null check everything in InvalidateMeasureIfContentSizeChanged #17472
    .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] [tests] Fix image for device tests on Android #17459
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17467
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Bump the microsoftextensions group with 1 update #17485
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7.0] Dependabot will manage versions on main #17488
  • Dependabot will manage versions on main #17460
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #17462
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Update README.md #17468
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [tests] Don't set xcode path #17451

Updated

  • Remove Debug and Release Entitlements plists and Replace with Custom Entitlements #16355
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix ScrollView filling layouts #17243
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • Make Android respect power saving/disabled animations #17287
    Under Consideration
  • [net7.0] [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #17093
    area/layout 🔲, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • [main] Build the previous .NET version of some nugets #17043
    area/architecture, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fixes for Border on Windows #17239
    s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • [X] don't expant types to Extension for x:Static #17276
    area/Xaml </>, stale, Under Consideration
  • [XamlC] fix generic array #17301
    area/Xaml </>, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Fixes border content clipping #17310
    s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix typo in build.sh #17305
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, stale
  • Grid rows ios fix #17199
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, stale, .NET 8 GA
  • Fixed window not reacting to TitleBar wnd message #17041
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, i/regression, stale, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image, stale, Under Consideration
  • Remove reference to concrete native host app #16803
    area/hosting 🧩, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix for #11991 - CollectionView SelectedItem BackgroundColor is always Gray on iOS #17464
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Update Flyout when Shell.FlyoutContent changes #17359
    area/shell 🐢, partner/hot-reload-xaml, Under Consideration
  • Changing value of Shell.NavBarIsVisible should change visibility of toolbar (ShellToolbar) #17358
    area/shell 🐢, partner/hot-reload-xaml, Under Consideration
  • [net7.0] 20230912 Android Ecosystem updates AndroidX #17318
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [net7.0] Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #16640
    area/image :framed_picture:, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Enable WinUI Controls Test Pipeline #17221
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, Under Consideration
  • Bump the androidx group with 14 updates #17401
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #17104
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Under Consideration
  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #14456
    area/essentials 🍞, stale, Under Consideration
  • [net8.0] Add .NET 7 to the NuGet packages #17048
    area/architecture, .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] Build the previous TFM for Essentials & Graphics #17042
    .NET 8 GA
  • Fixes BindableLayout leaks and EmptyViewTemplate issues #17290
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, memory-leak 💦, Under Consideration
  • Fix iOS/Win InputTransparent layouts and add several UI tests #17286
    Under Consideration
  • Reinstate animated GIF on iOS & macOS #17207
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • Add ViewHandler & IViewHandler docs #17167
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, s/pr-needs-author-input, Under Consideration
  • Ensure that the navigation page renderer measures its current Page #17164
    area/navigation 🧭, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, Under Consideration
  • Fix OnPlatform + Setter when no match for current platform #17061
    area/Xaml </>, Under Consideration
  • Add SetupContent/UnhookContent to WinUI ListView.CellControl #16977
    area/ListView, stale, Under Consideration
  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, Under Consideration
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, stale, memory-leak 💦, Under Consideration
  • [android] improve performance of Shell flyout opening #15733
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲, s/pr-needs-author-input, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Handle focus changes for UIButton #10614
    area/controls 🎮, control-button, s/pr-needs-author-input, Under Consideration
